name: The Simulation (Dmoten55)
description:
Programmers: Stephen Jacot & Derell Moten
Modeler: Derell Moten
Narrative & Level Design: Edwin Martinez
Audio: Brendan Valles

You have been playing in VR and you have found yourself trapped inside the simulation. You have been equipped with a grappling gun and you must find your way through the glitched city to find the exits in order escape get back home.

Please fill out this survey to give us feedback:

The Simulation Performance Survey
